about_the_game:
Forget the story of Little Red Riding Hood. Red's Ascent reimagines a familiar tale with action-packed rogue-like elements, offering you a completely different adventure. From an innocent girl collecting apples to a fierce warrior fighting for survival, an unforgettable action-rogue-like experience awaits you.

  • Thrilling Roguelike Loop: Every death makes you stronger. Upgrade your abilities, discover new items, and try again! Each run offers new strategies and different outcomes.

  • Dark and Captivating Atmosphere: Explore beautifully crafted forests, eerie caves, and perilous platforms brought to life with the best of pixel art. Moonlit paths and glowing eyes lurking in the woods create a truly unique atmosphere.

  • Dynamic Combat System: Defeat your enemies with fast and fluid hack-and-slash mechanics. Customize your playstyle with new skills, weapons, and a crafting system.

  • Engaging Storyline: At the heart of the game lies Red's journey to recover her lost memories and confront her past. The path to reaching her grandmother is filled with unexpected surprises and epic boss battles.

  • Rich Exploration Elements: Traverse diverse platforms and uncover hidden paths, special rewards, and enemy-filled arenas. Every door presents a new challenge and opportunity.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.9 Mavericks or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 chip or Intel Core i3 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ (Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent, Apple M1 GPU)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 Mojave or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 chip or Intel Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1+ (Intel Iris Plus Graphics, Apple M1 GPU)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.20 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT / ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DX9 compatible graphics card (Shader Model 3.0 supported)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 6850 or higher

short_description: Red's Ascent will take you on a challenging journey with an action-packed roguelike loop. Every death is an opportunity to respawn and try again, stronger than before. As you battle various enemies in different environments, you'll uncover the reasons behind your actions.
